DOC.brief_summary: To achieve satisfactory examination GI tract need distend endoscopic procedure . After examination many patient complain abdominal pain discomfort . This pain substantially reduce substituting room air CO2 colonoscopies ERCPs . The use CO2 colonoscopy become routine practice many endoscopy center . In study test hypothesis abdominal pain gastroscopy also reduce substitute room air CO2 .
